Package hospitalsystem.usercontrol

Class PatientUserControl

java.lang.Object
hospitalsystem.usercontrol.UserControl
hospitalsystem.usercontrol.PatientUserControl
public class PatientUserControl extends UserControl
Manages patient-specific user operations in the hospital system. Provides functionality for patients to view their medical records and update personal information. Implements restricted access to ensure patients can only view and modify appropriate information.
Since:
2024-11-19
Author:
Gracelynn

  • Method Details

    • displayPatientDetails

      public static void displayPatientDetails(User user)
      Displays patient medical record information. Shows only information accessible to patients: - Personal details - Appointment history - Current prescriptions - General medical information
      Parameters:
      user - User object (must be Patient type)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is not a Patient type

    • updatePatientDetails

      public static void updatePatientDetails(User user)
      Updates patient personal information through interactive interface. Allows patients to update: - Age - Email address - Phone number Includes input validation and confirmation.
      Parameters:
      user - User object (must be Patient type)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is not a Patient type
      NullPointerException - if user is null

    • updateAge

      public static void updateAge(Patient patient, int age)
      Updates patient age with validation. Ensures age is a positive number.
      Parameters:
      patient - Patient whose age is to be updated
      age - New age value

    • updateEmail

      public static void updateEmail(Patient patient, String email)
      Updates patient email address with format validation. Ensures email contains '@' symbol and proper format.
      Parameters:
      patient - Patient whose email is to be updated
      email - New email address

    • updatePhoneNumber

      public static void updatePhoneNumber(Patient patient, String phoneNumber)
      Updates patient phone number with format validation. Ensures phone number contains only numeric characters.
      Parameters:
      patient - Patient whose phone number is to be updated
      phoneNumber - New phone number
